material.mattext: Based on the output (a) How many of the 1200 sampled voters were satisfied? (b) What is the sample proportion p-hat of those who were satisfied. (c) What is the 95% confidence interval for p? Interpret this interval.

(a) 142 of the 1200 sampled voters answered that they were satisfied (b) The sample proportion is therefore .118, or roughly 12% (142/1200) (c) The 95% confidence interval for p is (.10, .14) (rounded) We are 95% certain that the proportion of US voters who are satisfied with the expiration of the federal ban on assault weapons is between .10 and .14 (or between 10% and 14%).
